hotels.title: Sophisticated Stay in Alam Sutera near Greater Jakarta Area with Poolside Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Sleek and sophisticated, this hotel has everything business travellers or leisure seekers need for a comfortable stay: an outdoor pool, fitness centre, serene spa, onsite restaurant and two bars. Located in the Alam Sutera district of Tangerang, on the western border of Indonesia’s capital city, Mercure Serpong Alam Sutera provides an oasis amid Greater Jakarta’s chaotic charm. After an afternoon exploring Alam Sutera’s shopping and entertainment hub, unwind with a tropical tipple from Maniz Pool Deck Bar and refresh in the sparkling water. Later, choose between international and local flare from Mint & Pepper Restaurant, before returning to your modern room.

hotels.title: Modern Retreat near Jakarta with Onsite Restaurant, Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Step into this refreshing retreat for a mix of modern commodities and a splash of local Indonesian charm. Take a dip in the rooftop pool for endless city views, head to the Lobby Bar for signature cocktails or mocktails, or immerse yourself in an al fresco setting at Kitchen Yard for everything from local dishes to international cuisine. Your gateway to one of Tangerang's most dyamic neighbourhoods, Mercure Tangerang BSD City is moments away from bustling shopping centres like AEON Mall, known for its Japanese-inspired boutiques. Satisfy your late-night cravings at Pasar Lama market, or for a full day of family fun, head to Ocean Park BSD City Serpong water park.

hotels.title: Sleek Tangerang Novotel City Retreat near Jakarta with Outdoor Pool, Spa & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience signature sophistication in the heart of Tangerang's bustling centre from this Novotel sanctuary, perfectly situated under an hour's drive from Jakarta. Relax in style in the hotel's chic rooms, soak up panoramic city vistas, indulge in a refreshing swim in the rooftop garden pool, sip on well-crafted cocktails from Sixth Sense Pool Bar and indulge in treatments at the spa. Stop by the onsite Square restaurant for Indonesian delicacies or step outside to sample authentic laksa at the nearby Laksa Culinary Park. For some retail therapy, walk over to the Tangcity Mall or head to the Old Market Tangerang for souvenir shopping. For history lovers, the Benteng Heritage Museum is within easy reach.

hotels.title: Stylish Tangerang City Oasis with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant charms of Tangerang from this plush Mercure retreat, ideally placed in the heart of the city, mere moments from the bustling Metropolis Town Square. Be it business or leisure, the hotel's trendy architecture coupled with its sophisticated interiors and a vast array of modern amenities are all designed to curate an epic city break in Java. Tuck into authentic Indonesian cuisine at Arumbae restaurant, sip on hearty teas, coffees or indulge with a well-crafted cocktail at the Pawela Lounge located in the lobby area. After a day of exploration, return to your chic sanctuary to enjoy a refreshing dip in the stunning rooftop pool and soak up the shimmering city vistas.
